content.question: The code segment is intended to compute the sum of all elements in all rows that have odd-numbered row indices. However, the code segment is not working as intended. Which of the following changes can be made so that the code segment works as intended?

choices.label: Changing line 2 to  for (int r = 0; r < board.length; r += 2)
Changing line 4 to  for (int c = 1; c < board[0].length; c += 2)

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
